features.name: order_management
features.description: Enables staff to efficiently view, search, and manage a digital menu while adding items with quantity to a customer's cart, supporting the processing of orders.

features.name: billing_and_receipts
features.description: Automatically calculates the order subtotal, applicable taxes, and the final total, allowing for discounts or promo codes, and generates digital or printable receipts.

features.name: inventory_tracking
features.description: Tracks item availability to inform staff about stock levels, ensuring that menu items are appropriately marked as in-stock or out-of-stock.
